Basic Archery.description: Unlocks basic proficiency with bows, crossbows, and adds a minuscule bonus to the effect of agility and strength when using a ranged weapon.
Basic Archery.flavor: An Archer's best friend is the bow in his hand, and the arrow in his foe's heart.

Basic One-Handed Weapon.description: Unlocks basic proficiency with most one-handed weapons and adds a minuscule bonus to the effect of agility and strength when using a fitting melee weapon.
Basic One-Handed Weapon.flavor: The Archer may not be a master in the arts of close combat but is far from helpless.

Archer\u2019s Eye.description: Allows the archer to more easily spot prey. Passively gives a minor increase to the effect of Perception on visual organs.

effects.passive_benefit: enhanced ability to spot weaknesses or targets

behavior.user feedback: Visual clarity increases gradually over ~5 seconds when skill activates

Archer\u2019s Eye.flavor: The eyes of the Archer are trained to track down and spot the weakness of their foes.

Identify.description: Allows the user to attempt to identify any object or creature by focusing on it.

effects.passive_benefit: Provides information about unknown items or entities upon focus.

Identify.flavor: Basic identification skill, known by all but the smallest of children of the myriad races.

behavior.activation_method: Focus on target object or creature for 3–4 seconds.
behavior.deactivation: Ends automatically after identification is complete.
behavior.user feedback: Displays a description popup for the identified object or entity.
